column8: was found dead in SHENANIGANS Bar Restaurant & Guesthouse
column15: the victim checked in at the guesthouse on June 23
column18: she noticed the bill had not been paid
column19: so asked another woman named Chak Riya
column20: to check the room with her. They knocked on the door
column21: but after no reply they decided to unlock the room. Inside they found the deceased lying on the bed and reported to the police.------After an autopsy
column22: it was concluded that the man died of a heart attack. The body was taken to Teuk Thlar pagoda.
